scripts.update: npm outdated -p | cut -d ':' -f 4 | xargs npm install
scripts.test: (rm -f .data/test.db .log/test.log || true) && node node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate up -e test -c 4 && export NODE_ENV=test && node --test | tee -a .log/test.log
scripts.dev: npm run test && (rm -f .data/badmr.sqlite3 || true) && npm run migrate && export NODE_ENV=dev && npm run open | tee -a .log/dev.log
scripts.prod: npm install && npm run migrate && export NODE_ENV=prod && node src/bin/start.js | tee -a .log/prod.log
scripts.release: npm run test &&   rsync --info=progress2 --ignore-times --delete --delete-after --recursive --exclude-from='/Users/r/Projects.localized/badmr/.gitignore' /Users/r/Projects.localized/badmr box:~/ && ssh box 'sudo /home/r/badmr/etc/scripts/release.sh'
